lead_paragraph: A celebratory occasion for a Thai Olympic bronze medal winner's family turned somber as the athlete's grandmother collapsed and died minutes before he won third place in the 56-kilogram weightlifting category.

headline.print_headline: Grandmother of Thai Olympian Dies Watching Him Lift on TV
headline.main: Grandmother of Thai Olympian Dies Watching Him Lift on TV

snippet: A celebratory occasion for a Thai Olympic bronze medal winner's family turned somber as the athlete's grandmother collapsed and died minutes before he won third place in the 56-kilogram weightlifting category....
